reference.title: Android Handset Properties
reference.shortdesc: Presents the basic properties of an Android handset, such as the device serial number, Android OS version, and API version.

refbody.section: To view the properties of an Android handset connected to your development computer, right-click the entry for the handset in the Device Management view and select Properties from the menu that appears. For more detailed properties, select Android Handset PropertiesDevice Properties in the left pane of the Properties dialog.
